mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (board_id, comment_content, comment_writer, comment_regdate) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{commentContent}, #{commentWriter}, #{commentRegdate})
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id as commentId, board_id as boardId, comment_content as commentContent, comment_writer as commentWriter, comment_regdate as commentRegdate FROM comments WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}

SELECT comment_id as commentId, board_id as boardId, comment_content as commentContent, comment_writer as commentWriter, comment_regdate as commentRegdate FROM comments WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY comment_regdate ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments WHERE board_id = #{boardId}

SELECT comment_id as commentId, board_id as boardId, comment_content as commentContent, comment_writer as commentWriter, comment_regdate as commentRegdate FROM comments WHERE comment_writer = #{commentWriter} ORDER BY comment_regdate DESC
